results.title: Dating Scammer Who Swindled Women Sentenced to Five Years in Prison
results.abstract: Over two decades, Patrick Giblin took hundreds of thousands of dollars from scores of women across the United States, federal court records show. A federal judge imposed a 66-month prison sentence.

media.caption: The Mitchell H. Cohen United States Courthouse in Camden, N.J., where Patrick Giblin was sentenced last week.

results.byline: By Hurubie Meko and Nate Schweber
results.title: Massive Fire Burns Down Part of an N.Y.P.D. Evidence Center in Brooklyn
results.abstract: A three-alarm fire led to the collapse of a portion of a warehouse compound in Red Hook. Much of the evidence kept there may be destroyed, according to officials.

media.caption: The fire, which was still burning late into the afternoon and might not be contained for several days, was called into the Fire Department at around 10:30 a.m., according to officials.

results.title: Trump Organization Was Held in Contempt After Secret Trial Last Year
results.abstract: The company was fined $4,000 after failing to turn over documents. The case is one of several in which investigators have found the ex-president or his company loath to hand over papers.
